sentences.sentence: Most of the time, teachers make sure their students do not use photocopied materials.
sentences.translation: 大多数时候，老师会确保他们的学生不会使用影印材料。

sentences.sentence: I can't imagine that! I don't think it right to use photocopied materials even in the classroom because it's against the law.
sentences.translation: 我无法想象！我认为即使在教室里使用影印材料也是不对的，因为这是违法的。

sentences.sentence: Staff photocopied the cheque before cashing it.
sentences.translation: 工作人员在兑现支票前先把它复印了。
